original_text: He and his people with him, the terrible of the nations, shall be brought to destroy the land: and they shall draw their swords against Egypt, and fill the land with the slain.
korean_text: 그가 여러 나라 가운데에 강포한 자기 군대를 거느리고 와서 그 땅을 멸망시킬 때에 칼을 빼어 애굽을 쳐서 죽임 당한 자로 땅에 가득하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: He and his people with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그와 함께 한 그의 백성이

sentences.original_text: shall be brought to destroy the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅을 멸망시키기 위해 이끌려 오리라

sentences.original_text: and they shall draw their swords against Egypt
and fill the land with the slain
